teleport.title: Teleport
teleport.description: Teleport target randomly around destination point
teleport.deprecationMessage: This event will be deprecated in 1.21.20 in favor of custom components

target.title: Target
target.description: The target context to execute against.

avoid_water.title: Avoid Water
avoid_water.description: Determines if the teleport avoids putting the target in water.

land_on_block.title: Land On Block
land_on_block.description: Determines if the teleport places the target on a block.

max_range.title: Maximum Range
max_range.description: Max range the target can teleport relative to the origin destination.

teleport.deprecationMessage: This property requires the following experimental toggle(s) enabled in your project config: 'holidayCreatorFeatures'.
